items.sentence: Tom hoped that he would become a famous writer.
Tom hosted an extravagant party at his mansion.
Tom introduced himself to everyone in the room.
Tom invited Mary to his place to watch a movie.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be interested in politics.
Tom doesn\'t seem to care one way or the other.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as well as Mary does.
Tom doesn\'t talk much about when he was young.
Tom said that he wants to read all these books.
Tom sat beside Mary and opened the photo album.
